name: Feed The Squirrel
description:
I've wanted to be a game developer for quite some time, so after some time studing Unity I started to make this game as a personal challange, I established a week's deadline and managed to finish it in time, I'm uploading the game for anyone who wants to play it and as a memory of the first game I made.

All the assets for the game were taken from the Unity Asset Store, only level design and development made by me.

Any feedbacks are apreciated.

PS: Game in portugese.
